summary: Iteration 6 - ALL 3 USER-REPORTED ISSUES VERIFIED FIXED. 1) Admin panel cursor working normally (body has NO 'portfolio-cursor' class on /admin), 2) Videos autoplay instantly in modal (iframe has autoplay=1&mute=1 + allow='autoplay'), 3) Direct video files use <video preload='metadata'> for first-frame thumbnails. All portfolio pages have custom cursor active. All 8 admin tabs accessible.
passed_tests: Admin page (/admin) body does NOT have 'portfolio-cursor' class - cursor visible
Admin login password input has 'text' cursor style (not hidden)
Admin login with password 'orbya2024' succeeds
Admin panel body class remains empty after login (no portfolio-cursor)
All 8 admin tabs visible and clickable (projects, skills, media, stats, quotes, config, colors, messages)
Home page (/) body HAS 'portfolio-cursor' class - custom cursor active
Work page (/work) body HAS 'portfolio-cursor' class
Skills page (/skills) body HAS 'portfolio-cursor' class
Contact page (/contact) body HAS 'portfolio-cursor' class
ADMIN link visible in navigation on all portfolio pages (Home, Work, Skills, Contact)
Work page shows 6 project cards with visible thumbnails
5 YouTube projects use img tags with YouTube auto-thumbnails
1 direct video project (RC CAR 2) uses <video preload='metadata'> for thumbnail
Direct video thumbnail has muted=true and playsInline=true attributes
YouTube video modal iframe src includes 'autoplay=1'
YouTube video modal iframe src includes 'mute=1'
YouTube video modal iframe allow attribute includes 'autoplay'
Direct video modal shows <video> element (not iframe)
Direct video modal has autoPlay=true, muted=true, playsInline=true attributes
Home page video modal has same autoplay settings as Work page
Category filters on Work page work correctly (ALL, AI VIDEOS, PRODUCT VIDEOS)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 user-reported issues are FIXED and VERIFIED: 1) Cursor CSS scoped to '.portfolio-cursor *' in index.css (lines 18-21), CursorWrapper in App.js adds/removes 'portfolio-cursor' class based on route (/admin has no class), 2) Video modal iframes have autoplay=1&mute=1 in URL and 'autoplay' in allow attribute, direct videos have autoPlay+muted+playsInline attributes, 3) ProjectCard.js uses <video preload='metadata'> for direct video thumbnails to show first frame. All 6 project cards have visible thumbnails. Ready for deployment.

bug_fixes_verified.admin_cursor_fixed: VERIFIED - /admin page body has NO 'portfolio-cursor' class, cursor is visible and interactive (password input has cursor:text)
bug_fixes_verified.video_autoplay_fixed: VERIFIED - YouTube embeds use autoplay=1&mute=1 and allow='autoplay', direct videos use autoPlay+muted+playsInline attributes
bug_fixes_verified.video_thumbnail_fixed: VERIFIED - Direct video files use <video preload='metadata' muted playsInline> to display first frame as thumbnail
